title: Stationeers
notes: Audio distorted / Freezes as soon as world is loaded / Mainmenu works fine

title: Stationeers
notes: The game run fine for me, but the mouse jump frequently (every few seconds if you use the mouse). This make the game unplayable as you can't work without having the player watching somewhere else every 5s :(

title: Stationeers
notes: ~60 FPS, mouse occasionally spazzes out, rendering on the interactive consoles is somewhat broken

Performance seems fine, running stable around 70fps with "Fantastic" quality preset in the tutorial scenario. I also enabled reflections. The only visual error I had was excessive tearing. I'm fine with a little bit, but in this game it was much worse than I've seen before. Enabling VSync did not help.

Unfortunately I didn't play any longer than 5 minutes due to my mouse jumping randomly every now and then. Everything seemed fine but I'm rating it 'Bronze' because of this because it's not a fun experience as it stands right now with that issue.
title: Stationeers

notes:
The game runs fine, no performance issues or glitches that I could see, though the mouse slowly drifts to the side when pressing a button.
Nothing that makes the game unplayable, though it gets a bit annoying when trying to do things that require precision.
title: Stationeers

notes: Have to install corefonts with winetricks otherwise some text is missing from the game (important things like the airlock console text)
title: Stationeers
